description: Retrieves details about an access policy on a given store.

parameters.name: s3AccessPointArn
parameters.description: The S3 access point ARN that has the access policy.

nested_items.name: s3AccessPointArn
nested_items.description: The S3 access point ARN that has the access policy.

nested_items.name: storeId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services-generated Sequence Store or Reference Store ID.

nested_items.name: storeType
nested_items.description: The type of store associated with the access point.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The time when the policy was last updated.

nested_items.name: s3AccessPolicy
nested_items.description: The current resource policy that controls S3 access on the store.
